home.bannerText: I'm a Web Developer who has unending enthusiasm for solving problems.

aboutSection.name: George Kourtis
aboutSection.shortDesc: Let's connect and create remarkable digital experiences together!
aboutSection.fullDesc: I'm George Kourtis, a passionate front-end developer based in Greece. With three years of experience in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, WordPress, and Vue.js, I create seamless web experiences. I thrive on innovation and enjoy tackling complex problems with elegant solutions. My attention to detail and dedication to clean code ensure high-quality results. Continuous learning is my driving force. I stay up to date with the latest trends and frameworks, providing innovative solutions that exceed client expectations.

experienceSection.name: Services i use to work with..
experienceSection.dsc: I have gained expertise in a range of languages and tools including JavaScript, HTML, CSS, WordPress, Vue.js, and Git. These technologies have empowered me to create dynamic and engaging web experiences.

contact.bannerText: Hey, I'm George Kourtis - hope you manage to say my name properly, but if not, no worries

form.title: Fill the form below for more information

portfolio.dsc: Welcome to my portfolio showcase! Here you will find a collection of projects that highlight my skills and expertise as a junior developer. Through these projects, I aim to demonstrate my ability to create engaging web applications, websites, and mobile applications. Each project showcases my problem-solving abilities, attention to detail, and dedication to delivering high-quality work.

newslletter.title: Sign Up For
newslletter.dsc: Subscribe to the newslleter to receive updates and new oncoming projects
